values.name: Very Low
values.description: Applies to few organizational missions/business functions (Tier 1), mission/business processes (Tier 2), or information systems (Tier 3)

values.name: Low
values.description: Applies to some organizational missions/business functions (Tier 1), mission/business processes (Tier 2), or information systems (Tier 3).

values.name: Moderate
values.description: Applies to many organizational missions/business functions (Tier 1), mission/business processes (Tier 2), or information systems (Tier 3).

values.name: High
values.description: Applies to most organizational missions/business functions (Tier 1), mission/business processes (Tier 2), or information systems (Tier 3).

values.name: Very High
values.description: Applies to all organizational missions/business functions (Tier 1), mission/business processes (Tier 2), or information systems (Tier 3).
